title: About
body: EASEOUT was launched in February 2020 by Tim Robards in Montreal, Canada. We're a web design & development blog showcasing the very best design found on the internet, as well as highly relevant articles on web development. The website runs on [Netlify](https://netlify.com) and was built with Nuxt & VUE. **FAQS:** * **Q:** Can I advertise? **A:** Yes! Email hello@easeout.co * **Q:** Can I submit my website? **A:** Sure can! Email hello@easeout.co * **Q:** How can I keep up with everything? **A**: Check out our [subscribe](https://www.easeout.co/page/subscribe) page. * **Q:** How can I show some love? **A:** You could [buymeacoffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/iNrSbC8kz) :) Your suggestions & feedback are always welcome! I really want to continuously improve your user experience. \- Tim
